entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
